examples.description: # Get manifests for an application at a specific revision
# Get manifests for a multi-source application at specific revisions for specific sources

flags.description: If set, show locally-generated manifests. Value is the absolute path to app manifests within the manifest repo. Example: '/home/username/apps/env/app-1'.
Path to the local repository root. Used together with --local allows setting the repository root. Example: '/home/username/apps'. (default ".")
Show manifests at a specific revision
Show manifests at specific revisions for the source at position in source-positions
Source of manifests. One of: live|git (default "git")
List of source positions. Default is empty array. Counting start at 1. (default [])
